name: statuesquely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is attractively tall and large, and sometimes not moving: She is a statuesquely beautiful and highly intelligent woman. She was standing statuesquely at the top of the stairs.
More examplesFewer examplesShe stands statuesquely while the other dancers scurry around her.The statuesquely beautiful soprano took to the stage with the Ulster Concert Orchestra.She stood statuesquely proud as she posed for pictures.Built statuesquely at almost two metres tall, she is hard to miss.
